keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure that no-one pays tax on their first £10,000 of earnings.
Link the State Pension with earnings to give people the retirement they deserve.
Introduce robust regulation for banks, control bonuses AND get tax payers money back.
Extend proportional representation to Westminster and introduce fixed term parliaments.
Make it a local, national and global priority.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Seek a political solution to the conflict in Afghanistan
keyPolicies.policyDescription: So we can bring our troops home.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In East Lothian the Lib Dems are the ONLY effective alternative voice. Only the Lib Dems can challenge Labour.

issues.environment: Tackle Climate Change - Make it a local, national and global priority.

endorsements.endorsement: They [the Liberal Democrats] show that there is a place in politics for boldness and original thinking.
Lib Dem leader Nick Clegg - who has taken the most principled stand of any party leader on this issue [expenses reform].

quotes.text: They [the Liberal Democrats] show that there is a place in politics for boldness and original thinking.
Lib Dem leader Nick Clegg - who has taken the most principled stand of any party leader on this issue [expenses reform].

images.caption: Stuart Ritchie in front of a bridge and body of water.
